Supports 24/7 phone, chat, and email access to Cloud Support Engineers for unlimited contacts, with and a response time of less than 1 hour.

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Write up about the changes I made:
Change EC2 instance type from c4.4xlarge to c4.8xlarge
Change EC2 pricing strategy to Standard Instance Savings Plans
Change RDS instance type to db.m5.8xlarge
Minor change (more support) for AWS Support
>> These changes will increase the performance of web server and database and increase response time from AWS support
